short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage and search your tabs easily and save sessions for resuming your work

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smart Tabs is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you efficiently manage your open tabs. With Smart Tabs, you can quickly search through your open tabs, switch to any tab with a single click, and save or load your tab sessions with ease. Whether you're juggling multiple tabs for work or research, Smart Tabs will keep your browsing organized and productive.

Features:
Search Your Tabs: Easily filter through your open tabs by their titles using the intuitive search bar.
Switch Tabs: With one click, instantly switch to any tab you need.
Save Your Session: Save your current tab session and restore it later with a click of a button.
Load Saved Sessions: Reopen your previously saved tab sessions, even after restarting Chrome.
Keyboard Shortcut: Open the extension with the default keyboard shortcut Alt+X for quick access.
Smart Tabs helps you stay focused by reducing the clutter of multiple open tabs and letting you organize your browsing experience. Whether you're working on a project, researching, or just browsing, Smart Tabs ensures that your tabs are easily accessible and manageable.
